meta.title: ImageWhisper - AI Image Captioning
meta.description: Upload an image and get an AI-generated caption with ImageWhisper.

homePage.title: ImageWhisper
homePage.subtitle: Let AI paint a thousand words for your pictures.

imageCaptioningForm.cardDescription: Upload an image and our AI will describe it for you.
imageCaptioningForm.uploadSupportedFormats: PNG, JPG, GIF, WEBP up to 4MB
imageCaptioningForm.fileTooLargeError: File is too large. Maximum size is 4MB.
imageCaptioningForm.fileReadError: Failed to read the image file.
imageCaptioningForm.captionPlaceholder: Your image caption will appear here once generated.
imageCaptioningForm.imageAndCaptionPlaceholder: Your uploaded image and caption will appear here.
imageCaptioningForm.poweredBy: Powered by Genkit and BLIP model.
